meanings.definition: A large whale with a hump on its back.
meanings.sent1: The humpback swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw a humpback during our whale watching tour.
meanings.sent3: The humpback whale told a funny joke to its friends.
meanings.sent4: The humpback of the mountain rose majestically against the sky.
meanings.sent5: Children were amazed by the size of the humpback whale.

meanings.sent1: She carried a heavy humpback of books on her back.
meanings.sent2: The camel had a humpback filled with water.
meanings.sent3: The humpback of pillows on the bed made it cozy.
meanings.sent4: The humpback of the hill looked like a giant sleeping creature.
meanings.sent5: The humpback of the turtle shell provided protection.
